website_summaries.verdict: Perfect for anyone seeking full facial coverage and fast-acting sinus relief.
pros: Extra-large mask covers most of the face for maximum sinus relief
The large size also blocks light effectively
The mask will hold the heat for long periods after being turned off
Mask is easy to use with 3 simple heat settings: low, medium, high
Mask is made from soft, high-quality fabric
cons: USB power cord is located near the front of the mask, making it easier to get tangled in

customer_reviews.title: Only top part has a heating element
customer_reviews.text: Only top part of the mask works. It only has a heating element on the top part like a line. It only heats up your forehead. You have to pull the top part down on your eyes or on your lower nose for maxillary sinuses to heat up those areas. which does not seat right and doesn’t feel good. I wish they had the heating elements placed right on all the front part. Its not like the microwave activated pads heats up all your face. Not worth to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Turk Basar

customer_reviews.title: Stays warm for a long time
customer_reviews.text: i get awful sinus headaches that make me nauseous every time it rains. I used to have to get up every 15 minutes to put my sinus mask in the microwave to keep it warm. This stay warm for hours which means no getting up and down and its a huge relief to aching sinuses
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Cary

customer_reviews.title: MY NEW FAVORITE PRODUCT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this product! It came right on time when I needed it most. My sinuses were making miserable, my face and head hurt so much. I get so much relief from this heated mask. I wish they had one with holes for the eyes so I can look at tv while I’m wearing it. Side note, my Pomsky puppy doesn’t like it, he barks at me when I’m wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: DENISE

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly great
customer_reviews.text: Got it for sinusitis, but it is actually pretty versatile. It sits nicely on the back of the neck to relax the spine, and pushed up on the forehead for headache. It is good and hot, with three settings.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Chasko

customer_reviews.title: Too hot on eyes!
customer_reviews.text: It has to be plugged in to work and heats up the eyes too much! I returned it
customer_reviews.author: Atusa J Tidwell

customer_reviews.title: Kind of cool
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well. It was good for relaxing. It was nice on my eyes. I actually have blafaritus and I could feel a bit of a differents with the pores on the eye lids. I took one point off because I don't see how it can help with Sinus problems which is why I bought it for my wife. If you are looking for something that affects the skin or for a nice relax its great. For sinus no way.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: My husband love this. It is perfect for his sinus pain and just relaxing. I just got on to order another one for myself and they are out of stock. So sad!!
customer_reviews.author: Lorna J Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Won’t stay on after one month of use.
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this mask for about a month and it won’t stay on now. Very disappointed in the quality. There are three settings on this mask. If you are using it for the same purpose I did (migraines/waking up with migraines) then you will want to use the green level which is the lowest heat setting. I have not tried the other two settings since the lowest setting is plenty hot.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Forehead burned!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my husband as a gift. He used it to relief his sinus pain. Yesterday, he tried it again. After a minutes he felt the burn and immediately took it off. The two big blisters appeared! I think this item is not safe to use at all! Returning it ASAP!
customer_reviews.author: sofia

customer_reviews.title: Only works for a short time.
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! Worked great for three days. Now it won’t turn on (heat up). I think it’s an issue with the cord connection. I am returning and getting a replacement. I’ll see if the new one works better and the one I got was just a bad one. I returned the original one. They replaced it. This one has worked a few weeks. Now the Cover on the cord is pulling off both ends. I used electrical tape to try to keep it together. Now the cord falls out of the mask easily. More tape I guess. I don’t think it will last tho. Sad. I love it. Wish it was actually durable.
customer_reviews.author: CSI

customer_reviews.title: Only worked once....
customer_reviews.text: This was use once in July and warmed up and helped with a headache. The second time I went to use it in September to help with a headache it completely did not work. The connection to the "on" button appears to be faulty and the unit would not light or heat. Now it's too late to return and the mask only worked once. What a waste to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Smells of burning fabric
customer_reviews.text: It got really hot and started to smell as if it was burning Unplugged and won’t ever use again Good concept but not safe.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Worked twice then broke.
customer_reviews.text: Used twice. The third time it was not working. Just past the return period. Good product when it worked, would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: How have I lived without this contraption
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE it, I have horrible allergies and this helps eliminate the sinus pressure. I do wish the heating part came all the way to the bottom of the mask but it does heat up enough to compensate for that.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Weak
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived quickly. Item is soft and easy to use however this product barely gets warm. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, only wish it had a timer to turn off automatically. Definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great for migraines
customer_reviews.text: Great for treating my migraines. Would be perfect if it had an auto shutdown option as I tend to fall asleep while using it
customer_reviews.author: Dog Mom DFW

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: grrat device for the money. It’s very relaxing for the eyes and I use at night. Helps me fall sleep quickly. Love it
customer_reviews.author: RAR

customer_reviews.title: SOOOOOOOOOO COMFORTABLE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Really helps with migraines! Thank you so much! It truly helps my sinus headaches and migraines.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy V.

customer_reviews.title: Great..... good item to have on hand.....or on face! Hahahaha!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing...I look ridiculous but who cares! The highest heat is a little too hot for me but That’s ok :) Could really be helpful to someone who has a Migraine...etc....I just love it so I can relax :)
customer_reviews.author: TRACY LYNN

customer_reviews.title: Great but sad
customer_reviews.text: It's an okay product but it stopped working after a few months. Like there was a short in the charger.
customer_reviews.author: tmae455

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Have used this product twice and now the power connector on the mask has an issue. I thought it was the cord 'wiggling' in the socket, causing the mask to turn off. But further investigation indicates it is a connection inside the mask, which can't be fixed without taking it apart. I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Rabber

customer_reviews.title: I got a bad one
customer_reviews.text: Loved how it felt nice and soft only problem I got a defective one that didnt get warm. On the highest setting you could barely tell it was on. On the low settings no heat came out at all. I was very excited to use it to relieve sinus pressure. But sadly will be returned
customer_reviews.author: Dana Stokes

customer_reviews.title: Works well to relieve sinus pain and pressure.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well as claimed. A bit expensive for what it is. But it does work well.
customer_reviews.author: Vernon Ernest Warnock

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it , Have been looking for something similar for years
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: soft, warm, fast
customer_reviews.text: totally works, amazing not only for pain but also for relax
customer_reviews.author: Thiago Gripp

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The usb keeps falling out of the slot of the mask, it isn’t tight.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Burchbark

customer_reviews.title: Soft and warm - effective
customer_reviews.text: Wish this would charge then operate. Must stay plugged in which is sometimes uncomfortable. Soft and warm though so effective on a headache or sinus infection.
customer_reviews.author: kpizzo12

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this sinus mask. it works well and I love it
customer_reviews.author: Toya C

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help relive sinus pressure. WOW it feels great and is relaxing
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Probably good for migraines or eye issues.
customer_reviews.text: It came promptly and was as described. I wish it had a moist heat feature and that there was an option for eyes to be uncovered. I used as sinus mask so did not need darkness.
customer_reviews.author: lily hannon

customer_reviews.title: The plug in adapter does not work properly therefore it does not charge at all
customer_reviews.text: Use for sinus headaches and to help relieve pressure but the plug in for the heater does not work all it does it cycle through the three levels and turns off immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Ogden

customer_reviews.title: I love this!
customer_reviews.text: I love this!! It is so soft and fits perfectly!!
customer_reviews.author: Maurica

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working. Too late to return. Threw it in the garbage
customer_reviews.author: MBG

customer_reviews.title: sinus
customer_reviews.text: I love the heat on my face when my sinuses are killing me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waist your money.
customer_reviews.text: Its stopped heating after the 3rd use. Very disappointed😥 Wouldn't waist your money.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Item was not what I really expected. I ended up giving it away.
customer_reviews.author: LA Toya N. Willis

customer_reviews.title: Burn on skin
customer_reviews.text: This really fits well on my face. After a few minutes on I got a burn from it. I will use it for sleep or meditation only.
customer_reviews.author: lori schmitt

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: I have chronic migraine headache since I was 18 years old. Time to time, I try different product and 80% of the time is not what I want. But, 20% of time I get what I want and sometimes I hit the jackpot. This product is one of those jackpots. I get pain around my eyes and on the back of my head. It calms my sinus pain and after 10 minutes I put it around my neck.
customer_reviews.author: HRS

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect to get a long life out of this product...
customer_reviews.text: Heating element failed after 4 nights of pretty gentle use (lowest setting). I also agree with other comments about the spread of the heating area - it doesn't cover the width or depth shown on the sales literature. The head straps are too wide and I think many people would either find them irritating the area where their ears join the head, or would need (as I did) to wear the straps over the tips of the ears. I cannot recommend this mask and will be looking for a more reliable alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Disappointed

customer_reviews.title: A terrific headache remedy
customer_reviews.text: I get sinus headaches that require heat to bring relief. With this mask, I don't have to get up every ten minutes to microwave a heat pack. I have a phone charger cord right next to my recliner, so I can plug this mask into the charger and forget jumping up. It relieves my headache comfortably and without drugs. It lets me snooze in the recliner. I've even laid it around my neck or across my shoulder for a spot of heat where needed. I love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Edith A.

customer_reviews.title: After return window closes, these stop working?
customer_reviews.text: After using only for about a month, it just quits. Return window closed then it craps out? That is awful. My wife loved it and had come to NEED it. I wish it was lasting longer.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Uba

customer_reviews.title: I am glad that I have found this product.
customer_reviews.text: I am a person who suffers from serious sinus headaches after flights. The longer the flight, the worse the sinus headache. I am so glad that I have found this product on amazon and purchased it. I wear it around my forehead and cheeks for 20-30 mins, it gives me immediate relief. There are three levels of heat, I use the second (blue) or sometimes the third (red) level and never have had any issues like skin irritation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heating pad for the face
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! This product is a heating pad for your face with most of the heat coming at the forehead. It is much better than putting another product in the microwave for 24 to 40 seconds and doing the whole process over and over again.
customer_reviews.author: MikeG

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and soft
customer_reviews.text: I have actually worn this without the heat on to block the TV (husband) at night because its comfortable enough to fall asleep with. REMEMBER, there is no real off timer so it can stay hot all night if you forget. I love this and it really helps with sinus issues.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Reinhold

customer_reviews.title: If you have allergies or sinus headaches, this is for you!
customer_reviews.text: This far exceeded my expectations! It’s very soft and makes a huge difference in how I feel. It gets a little too warm on my eyelids but otherwise it’s wonderful. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: margaret stacks

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for my sinus congestion. I had a similar mask years ago and had been unable to find a replacement. Worked well and helped provide comfort during my recovery from recent sinus infection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helps w headaches but broke quickly
customer_reviews.text: The cable broke within 2 months. It worked great then the cable started shirting out. The light would flicker and now it will not work. It is light weight and helps with headaches but now I am having to look for another product.
customer_reviews.author: Lory Gamboa

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sinus mask for my husband and it worked great for about a month and then it starting shutting off after being on for about 10 minutes. We even bought another as a gift...I hope that one works better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OMG- built for a guy's BIG head!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't fit. Heat was nowhere near sinuses. Didn't work. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: ZZ Walden

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Not a good variation between settings, but works really great. perfect to help get your eyes feeling better before bed for a good night sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Andi

customer_reviews.title: Really warms up; large size blocks all light.
customer_reviews.text: This eye mask gets warmer than any of The others I’ve purchased, which is terrific. If too warm for some, just tap the button once and the heat lowers quite quickly. I also like that it is large, so no light sneaks in.
customer_reviews.author: Peggie

customer_reviews.title: Great heat mask!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best solution I have ever found to deal with my sinus headaches. I LOVE it!! Lightweight, comfortable and stays hot.
customer_reviews.author: VW

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good price, five stars
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work pretty well. I would recommend it for headaches, migraines, or eye strains. Seems to help me a lot.
customer_reviews.author: KR Ranch

customer_reviews.title: Helped with sinus and allergies
customer_reviews.text: It has helped my sinus and allergies cant go wrong with this but one thing is annoying is the cord. But other than that it's good to use
customer_reviews.author: Delena

customer_reviews.title: Relieves sinus and head pain from allergens and weather pressure
customer_reviews.text: This helps me with eye, ear and head pain due to allergies and weather related sinus pain.
customer_reviews.author: LichenFinder

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with the mask. My wife love it. Easy to use. She said it relaxes her.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Burn mark on face after 10 to 15 minutes usage
customer_reviews.text: I returned this product because it left burn mark on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Sinus Nask
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I get sinus issues often. This mask eased the throbbing of sinus headache very well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Creatrill X-Large Heated Eye/Sinus Mask, USB Heating Compress Pad for Dry Tired Puffy Eyes, Dark Circle, Migraines Headache, Blepharitis, Sties, Sinus Pain Pressure Relief Hot Therapy (Black)
feature_bullets: Heat Therapy for Eye & Sinus Pain Relief: Made of premium black microplush, provides ultra comfy hot therapy for your eyes and sinus and promote blood circulation, relieve eye stress, Blepharitis, headache, puffy eyes, insomnia, dry eyes,sinus pressure and pain

Broader Heating Coverage Design: Unlike other heated eye mask just for eyes, our XL large eye mask offering large heated area covering eyes & sinus completely. Use it for a short break, at bedtime, dissolve away the day's stress, give eyes a super Spa
Super Convenient to Use - Portable and simply plug it to a PC, power bank or USB adapter to make it work. Easy for eye hot therapy anytime anywhere you like.

Fast Heating Effect with 3 Temperature Setting: Press button to change the mode, suggest to use Low temperature (Green LED) for long time therapy. Long press button for 3 seconds to turn it off. Perfect as birthday gift, thanksgiving gift and christmas gift.
Guaranteed: 6 month Warranty - a Free No-Hassle Replacement Process!

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
